story:
THANK YOU & BUY IT NOW:

Thanks to everyone who supported us! 

We have successfully funded our first run and are shipping games now. If you haven't ordered yet, go buy one of our games at

http://www.agameforgoodchristians.com




Description

A Game for “Good” Christians is card game which shows what you get if “Cards Against Humanity” and a conservative Christian seminary had a love child. Or if Apples to Apples was made by thoughtful pastors who read more than the footnotes in an NIV Bible.

A Game for “Good” Christians is made for people of all levels of Biblical knowledge, Jews, gentiles, atheists and agnostics: whether you dropped out of Sunday or Saturday school, or are throwing good money after bad in seminary, you’re guaranteed hours of thought-provoking fun, until the Rapture hits, or God strikes your house with lightning.

If you feel like a horrible person afterwards, you're probably doing it right, but remember: blame the player, not the game.

NOTE: since we're not sure how much shipping will actually cost, we're not including shipping & handling costs in the perks.  

Dear Clergy/Church leaders: You can purchase this game anonymously since you know you want a copy!

Game Play

For the first round, each player draws a hand of “canon” answer cards, and one player is chosen to begin the game as “the Pharisee.” The Pharisee then presents a “creed” question card to the group, like:

  • “For Lent I am giving up_____.”
  • “What do good Christians wait until marriage for?”
  • “King Solomon needed so many women because he was over-compensating for _____.”
  • “Loving your neighbor as yourself includes _____.”
  • “When good Christians don't understand something in the Old Testament, they simply add Jesus and _____.”
  • “What is known to make the baby Jesus cry?”

 Each player passes one faced-down canon card to the Pharisee in response. The canon deck includes such biblical gems as:

  • The forbidden fruit (Genesis 3)
  • Noah's awkward sexual encounter with his son ( Genesis 9:22)
  • Levitical sex ban (Lev 18)
  • David carrying a warm sack of 200 foreskins (1 Sam 18:26-28)
  • A pair of she bears mauling a group of kindergarteners (2 Kings 2:23-25)
  • A naked boy running through Gethsemane (Mark 14:51-52)
  • Midgets in trees (Luke 19:1-10)
  • The voice of God knocking you off your ass, on your ass (Acts 9)
  • A slightly stoned Paul (Acts 14:19)
  • Making stupid life choices and blaming them on Php 4:13 (Php 4:13)
  • A roaring lion seeking whom he may devour (1 Peter 5:8)

After the players submit their canon cards, the Pharisee shuffles all of the answers, reads the responses out loud, and chooses his/her favorite card: the most biblically accurate, the most humorous, the card most likely to send the player to hell, or all of the above.

The winning player is given the Creed card from that round and the next player in line becomes the new Pharisee. The first player to collect ten Creed cards wins.

 

Why We Are Here

This game was developed after years of encouraging our friends and family to “dig deeper” into what the text of the Bible means, and many irreverent and deeply theological conversations.

We’ve created and printed multiple mock versions of the game, which we piloted with friends and family, clergy and lay people, and people all over the spectrum of belief and lack thereof.

Based on the feedback we feel it is now time to focus our efforts to bring this game to a larger audience, so we are launching this project to raise the $8,000 we need to cover our first print run of the game and bring all this awesomeness to you.

If you want to own a copy this game, please help us reach our goal, or all this Biblical goodness will pass away. If this game makes you worry for your immortal soul, just remember: we love the Bible, we just have a funny way of showing It.

 

 FAQ

Are you smug, godless heathens who hate our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ, and are emissaries of the Antichrist, the Beast, and the Whore of Babylon?

Uhm, no.  The purpose of the game is NOT to mock the Bible. You might be offended by some of the cards. Good. We want you to figure out why you’re offended, especially if/when the card is a direct quote from the Bible. We love to hear “I didn’t know that was in the Bible,” “where the hell are they getting that from?,” and “wtf?!” so long as people are going back to the Text.

 

What comes with the game?

300 cards come in a complete deck: 60 Creed Cards and 240 Canon Cards. Expansion decks are in the works.

 

How well do I need to know the Bible to play this game?

Not very. You don’t need to know the Bible intimately to enjoy the game: people with all levels of biblical exposure have fun playing the game. At the bottom of each Canon Card, we provide the relevant passage of Scripture for reference and fighting.

 

Will God send me to hell for playing this game?

 Your God sucks if He/She/It does. Besides, of all the things you’ve done, do you really think this will be the straw that breaks The Camel’s back?

 

What about Shipping and Handling?

 When purchasing, your pledge covers the cost of the game, but not S/H. After the first production is completed, we will contact you about shipping options. We will suggest the cheapest/most timely delivery method to your location, but you are free to choose whatever method you prefer.

story:
About us

Willy Miniatures is a small company producing high quality miniatures for fantasy football and other miniature games. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams. To achieve this we always work with the most talented sculptors.

You can see our full catalogue and contact us here

http://willy-miniatures.blogspot.com.es/

 

Size comparisions between players

 

3D Sculpting 

 

Why crowdfunding?

Designing and sculpting nice miniatures is not cheap. We could go on producing some miniatures at a time, as we have been doing with our late projects, but with your help we can speed up the whole process. Using Indiegogo as a platform to rise funds helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures, obtain feedback from our customers and it gives us confidence to keep working on. It also offers you the possibility of being part of this project and to get some cool rewards.

 

PERKS

 

Reward Goals

If we reach 10.000$ All contributors of Level 6 and higher will get a WM miniature for free or a 50% off on a WM big guy.

If we reach 12.000$ ALL contributors will get a new Chaos Star Player for just 8$. increasing your perk the appropriate amount.

If we reach 14.000$ All contributors of Level 6 and higher will get a WM miniature for free or a 50% off on a WM big guy.

If we reach 16.000$ ALL contributors will get a second new Chaos Star Player for just 8$. increasing your perk the appropriate amount.

If we reach 18.000$ All contributors of Level 6 and higher will get a WM miniature for free or a 50% off on a WM big guy.

If we reach 20.000$ ALL contributors will get a third new Chaos Star Player for just 8$. increasing your perk the appropriate amount.

 

Note: The new Chaos miniatures, the new Minotaur and the new Chaos StarPlayers are in this cases not eligible.

Note2: yes, you can join two "50% off on a WM big guy" options and get a whole WM big guy for free ;) if those goals are reached.

 

Estimated delivery: Spring 2013 (except LEVEL 11 which depends on the painter)

story:
What is Planet X ?


Planet-X is about releasing the megalomaniac in every player. Nowadays, you can throw birds at pigs. You can farm carrots and crush candies. We offer MUCH better!
With us, you will become a Hand of Fate, the maker of destiny for entire solar systems, reshaping the Universe. The Universe has bugs, like unexpected life apparition or displaced asteroids, and you need to reboot the malfunctioning solar systems. This means suppressing biosphere, playing with asteroids as with marbles, ejecting moons, crushing planets into dust. Isn't it a dream job? 
The game is a physical game, where you will throw stellar objects in order to impact, eject, fragment, annihilate planets. The levels are composed of asteroid belts, planets, planetoïds, moons, suns, black-holes. Other spatial objects are considered, like for example neutron star, wormhole, comets, but we need your support to have the resources to develop them. 

Most of the levels will feature special missions, like resetting life on a planet, or destroying only ONE planet and leaving the others intact. 

Several projectiles can be unlocked during your progression, for more and more destructive effect, or specific missions, like spreading life in the universe. 

Planet-X includes a gravity system, explosion of planets into pieces, multiple camera angles, advance scoring system with combo.  Every action occurring, like planet explosion, planetary sun-burning and expulsion of the solar system will be included into the scoring. Becoming a top player will require focus, skills, and let's be honest, a dose of luck. 


Who are we ?

Wolfrog is an Estonian indie developer based in Tallinn, focusing on games loaded with epicness and appealing to old-school gamers like us. Our team is made of 1 artist, 1 developer and 1 game designer/manager, using the Unity3D plateform. 

Our team is modern and international : 2 are french, one is Estonian. 2 live in Tallinn and 1 in Moscow. We have been learning how to make video games for 1 year and a half, and we are now ready to give you our best. 

You probably have heard of Angry Birds by Rovio, from Finland. Helsinki is next door to Tallinn and Estonia and your support will make you part of the Wolfrog team, the future Estonian Rovio !


What we offer to the contributor

Once finished, the game will be released both in a free-to-play (F2P) AND a full version. We decide to go against the convention of mobile games because we remember that some gamers prefer to buy a full game, while others want to try for free and unlock content while playing. In addition, we guarantee that we will never develop pay-to-win game, a concept that annoys players a lot, and us too.  

You can either support us and get your name in the credits of the F2P version of Planet-X, or you can take our other offer and receive the complete version, with non in-app purchase. 

Or you can become part of our premium backers, and be part of the beta test, have early access and a Planet-X themed digital soundtrack. The bigger offer will allow you to enjoy exclusive game features, give names to elements of the game, or even design a level together with us. 



You can also choose the Galactic imperator or Bender of Multiverse offer, and receive one of the limited series of handmade necklaces with lava or meteorite stones + pendant laser-engraved with the Planet-X logo, designed and produced especially for the indigogo campaign. The collector's edition pendants are made by our partner ByVellamo. 

*Photos of the complete necklaces are coming soon* In the meantime, see below the meteorites stones : 


Meteorite pendants (with the Planet-X laser engraved tag)



Lava stone pendants (with the Planet-X laser engraved tag)


Lava stone and meteorite pendants (with the Planet-X laser engraved tag)




The platforms covered will be Android, Windows phone (Windows app store), Blackberry 10. 

The initial version will include 30 levels and the possibility to replay existing levels as you progress, with all the unlocked projectiles. 


What makes this project different ?

Other games are providing complex spatial simulation, running on tools similar to the ones NASA use. They are awesome in their genre, if you want to simulate the real world and we love them. 

But to us, Planet-X is more than that. We are not simulating the real universe, we are creating a Universe were YOU are at the center, and not a mere observer.

As a company made by and for old-school gamers, we know that the most fun is not in the best realistic simulation, top-of-the-art graphic effect, requiring a top level device. The quality of a game is in the best gameplay, in the most crazy ideas, in what will be memorable to play. Fun comes from the gameplay and memories of it, not from technical prowess. 


What will be done with the money ?


    1000$

    Completion of the physical engine and release of the game. 

    2000$

    Previous features + release as a facebook game + improved scoring system

    4000$

    Previous features + 20 additional levels + release on iOS

    8000$

    Previous features + 40 additional levels + Multiplayer mod

    10000$

    Previous features + Upgraded graphics + 40 additional levels + Release on console platforms  + level editor.

story:
Zur deutschen Beschreibung

Welcome to Braincademy 

"Braincademy" is a (edutainment-)application, which passes knowledge in a attractive way.

Many children and young people find it hard to learn for school. This can have several reasons, such as a negative reference to school and teachers or 'boring' subject matter.
Many parents decide in these situations to send their children to private lessons or other, for the child, unpleasant solutions. - So the child gets forced to learn.

But most children, however, learn best while having fun or being with friends. So a hands-on approach, in which the child does not feel compelled to cram for school, might work better for most pupils.
So the learners easy forget that they are learning for example for an exam and therefore learn often longer and more persistent.


Target audience:

The target audience of the application are primarily students who are looking for an attractive way to test what they've learned. But it also could be used for staff and employee taining.
Moreover, even the standard gamer and everyone who loves to play appealing trivia-games, alone or with friends, is addressed. Thats becuse Braincademy is not only tool for learning, it is also a game for in between.

 Brief description of the application:

"Braincademy" is a virtual gameshow in which the candidates are asked questions from preselected areas of knowledge. Unlike other well-known game shows and their game adaptations, players will not be disqualified for an incorrect answer, but at the sum of the accumulated points at the end of each round.

Before each round the user can decide whether he wants to play alone, against a group of friends or a large group of random players.
Depending on the device and the chosen game mode you play together on one device, over the local network or via Internet against each other.

Each player will be ranked based on its previous performances. So, in larger groups, only Players with a similar level of knowledge play against each other. So groups can join together based on their ranking or be assigned automatically in online games.
With this classification, which is symbolized in the form of a player level, each player can also control how they have evolved during the use of the Game.

Another part of the application are the various mini-games. Due to the various kinds of tasks used in the mini-games other skills, such as hand-eye coordination, lateral thinking and the development of problem-solving strategies, are also promoted.

Suitable question catalogs for a subject or topic can be created and expanded by the community itself through the braincademy-website. So it can be ensured that for each subject or topic, a questionnaire exists or can be created in a short time by a user.
Moreover, given questionnaires on general knowledge topics will be in the game by its release.

Current Development

There is currently a working prototype of the application for touch-enabled computer. It was first presented in 2012 at the CeBIT in Hanover to the public and got much attention from the visitors.

In addition to the prototype, there are already several minigames that use touchscreen inputs or motion detection (via Webcam), as well as a dozen funny animated cutscenes.
Even if the current version is 'only' a prototype it already has a full voice output. In addition to an female assistant, who accompanies the player through the menu, it contains a moderator who guides the player through the game.
For this project, the prototype is however completely overhauled and optimized in some places in order to increase the fun and performance.

What we need and what you get

What we need is simple. Your support spread the word or donate a small ammount!

But we do not only want you to donate and spread the word, we also want to say thank you with some perks for our contibutors.
25€ (~31 US$)
You have the chance to participate in the closed beta. You can create your own account and play till you drop.

42€ (~53 US$)
We will tell you the answer to life the universe and everything! Really! Plus a copy of the finished game (digital copy) AND a Braincademy-Shirt!.

50€ (~63 US$)
You get every perk of a lower price plus the finished game for free before the official release!

75€ (~95 US$)
NOTE: THIS PERK IS ONLY FOR SUPPORTERS WITH A SHIPPING ADDRESS IN EUROPE!
You get every perk of a lower price plus one of 75 limited braincademy shirts.

100€ (~126 US$)
You get alongside the final version of the game and a shirt, and an original sketch from the developer documentation ... So either a page of the storyboard or script.

200€ (~250 US$)
You can be part of the development team! You get a direct link to the developer center and can put own ideas and suggestions, how the game can be improved, on the table. Moreover you get the chance to put your own qutions or challanges for minigames into the game. Just tell us your idea.

500€ (~633 US$)
You will become a honorary producer. Oh yes, you will be able not only to learn the joys of all previous perks, but also mentioned by name in the game.

Our development levels

Regardless of how the campaign proceeds, Braincademy will sooner or later be available for all those interested.
But to get a better idea on the objectives we want to achieve here is a short list ehich feature will be released on which ammount:

Level 1: 500€
The application will be released for Mac and Pc and have a multiplayer mode via the Internet.
The donated money will be used for the infrastructure of the multi-player mode as well as for the licensing of sounds, music, etc..

Level 2: 1000€
Half way through! This means: Better graphics, better sound and a local network game mode.
There also will be a portal for submitting further questions and a community site.

Level 3: 2000€ (My Funding Goal)
We made it! The game will be released not only for Mac and PC, but also for Android devices. The language of the game menues will be in German and English.
There will be more mini games and questions, as well as the possibility of submitting your own questions!

Level 4: 5000€
Wow. Thats a lot of money, but we still have ideas we want to fulfill.
With this budget, it will be possible to hire people who help us bringing the game to the iPhone ... Yes, you heard right. We plan an iPhone app from this level on!
With this ammount of money we again polish our graphics to the max and develop a better, faster multiplayer mode...

You can also help in other ways

If you can't donate it's fine. Just share this campain on Facebook and Twitter. Or just become a fan of our Facebook page or follow our Twitter account. If your mom and dad like us, ask them if they want to donate! If you're close friends with the President of the USA, let him know, too! Help us spread the word!

  • Share this project via your Social Networks.
  • Like us at Facebook or follow us on Twitter.
  • Tell your friends and family about this project.
  • Or simply give us feedback why you think Braincademy is interesting for you.
  • And if you have nifty hands in terms of design and graphics ... We are always looking for someone that can help us at work! ;-)

Jump to our Update section...

Links to our social network pages...

 
 
Jump to the english description

Braincademy 

Vorstellung

"Braincademy" ist eine (Edutainment-)Anwendung, die Wissen auf spielerische Weise weitergibt und Gelerntes festigt.

Vielen Kindern und Jugendlichen fällt es schwer, für die Schule zu lernen. Dies kann verschiedene Gründe haben, wie ein negativer Bezug zu Schule und Lehrern oder Lehrstoff, der nicht ansprechend genug vermittelt wird.
Viele Eltern entschließen sich in diesen Situationen dazu ihre Kinder zu Nachhilfestunden zu schicken, oder andere dem Kind oftmals unangenehme Lösungswege einzuschlagen.

Da die meisten Kinder jedoch mit Spaß, Freude und eventuell Freunden besser lernen können, ist eine spielerische Herangehensweise, bei der das Kind nicht das Gefühl hat, gezwungenermaßen Schulstoff zu pauken, besser.
So vergisst der Lernende schnell, dass er gerade zum Beispiel für eine Klausur lernt, und ist somit oftmals länger und ausdauernder bei der Sache.


Zielgruppe:

Die Zielgruppe der Anwendung sind in erster Linie Schüler und Studenten, die einen ansprechenden Weg suchen, Ihr gelerntes Wissen zu testen und zu festigen. Aber auch zum Training von Angestellten und als Ergänzung zu Mitarbeiterschulungen soll die Anwendung einsetzbar sein.
Darüber hinaus soll auch der normale Spieler angesprochen werden, der zwischendurch einfach nur zum Zeitvertreib, alleine oder gegen Freunde, ein Quiz-Spiel spielen will.
 


Kurze Beschreibung der Anwendung:

Bei "Braincademy" handelt es sich um eine virtuelle Quiz-Show, bei der den Kandidaten unter anderem Fragen aus vorher ausgewählten Wissensgebieten gestellt werden. Im Gegensatz zu bekannten anderen Spielshows und deren Spieleadaptionen wird der Anwender bei einer falschen Antwort nicht disqualifiziert, sondern an der Summe der erspielten Punkte bewertet.

Dabei kann der Benutzer vor Beginn des Spieles entscheiden, ob er allein, gegen einen Freund oder gegen eine größere Gruppe von Spielern antreten will.
Abhängig vom verwendeten Gerät und nach Wahl des Spielmodus tritt man gemeinsam an einem Gerät über das lokale Netzwerk oder über das Internet gegeneinander an.

Damit in größeren, zusammengewürfelten Gruppen nur Spieler mit einem ähnlichen Wissensstand aufeinandertreffen, wird jeder Spieler anhand seiner vorherigen spielerischen Leistungen bewertet. So können sich Gruppen anhand ihrer Bewertung zusammenschließen oder werden bei Online-Spielen automatisch zugewiesen.
Mit dieser Einstufung des Spielers, die in Form eines Spieler-Levels symbolisiert wird, kann sich jeder Anwender darüber hinaus selbst kontrollieren, wie die eigenen Leistungen sind und wie sie sich entwickelt haben.

Einen weiteren Teil der Anwendung stellen die verschiedenen Mini-Spiele dar. Sie dienen dem Spieler als Abwechslung zu den Quiz-Runden. Durch die vielfältigen Aufgabenarten, die in den Mini-Spielen verwendet werden, fördern sie darüber hinaus weitere Fähigkeiten, wie zum Beispiel die Hand-Auge-Koordination, Querdenken oder das Erarbeiten von Problemlösungsstrategien.
Um Quiz-Runden und Mini-Spielen deutlich abzugrenzen, werden diese primär durch andere Bedienweisen gesteuert als die Frage-Runden.

Die passenden Fragenkataloge zu den jeweiligen Fächern/Themen können von der Community selbst über die Webseite erstellt und erweitert werden. Darüber hinaus werden vorgegebene Fragenkataloge zu allgemeinen Wissensthemen bereits zum Release verfügbar sein. Dadurch kann gewährleistet werden, dass für jedes Fach oder Thema ein Fragenkatalog existiert oder in kurzer Zeit erstellt werden kann.

Aktuelle Entwicklung:

Momentan existiert ein funktionierender Prototyp der Anwendung für touchfähige Computer, der zum ersten Mal 2012 auf der CeBIT in Hannover der Öffentlichkeit zugänglich gemacht wurde.

Darüber hinaus existieren bereits diverse Minispiele, die per Touchscreen-Eingaben oder über eine Bewegungserkennung (die percWebcam funktioniert) gesteuert werden, sowie ein Dutzend lustig animierter Zwischensequenzen. Zwar handelt es sich bei der aktuellen Entwicklung 'nur' um einen Prototypen, aber dafür besitzt er bereits eine komplette Sprachausgabe, die neben einer Assistentin, die den Spieler durch das Menü begleitet, auch einem Moderator, der durch das eigentliche Spiel führt, enthält.
Für dieses Projekt wird der Prototyp jedoch generalüberholt und an einigen Stellen optimiert um den Spielspaß zu erhöhen.

Was wir brauchen und was du bekommst

Was wir brauchen ist schnell erklärt. Eure Unterstützung in Form von Geld oder Mundpropaganda! Helft uns Braincademy bekannt zu machen.

Aber wichtiger, als dass was wir brauchen ist, dass was ihr bekommen könnt!

Ab 25€ ...
habt ihr die Chance an der geschlossenen Beta teilzunehmen. Ihr könnt euch einen eigenen Account erstellen und nach Herzenslust spielen.

Für 42€ ...
verraten wir euch die Antwort auf alles! Ja... echt! Und dazu erhaltet ihr das fertige Spiel gratis vor dem offiziellen Release UND eins von 75 Braincademy-Shirts!

Ab 50€ ...
erhaltet ihr darüber hinaus das fertige Spiel gratis vor dem offiziellen Release!

Für 75€ ...
gibt es dazu noch eines von 75 (ja, limitiert!) Braincademy-T-Shirts!

Für 100€ ...
erhaltet ihr neben der finalen Version des Spieles und einem Shirt, eine original Skizze aus den Entwicklerunterlagen... also entweder eine Seite des Storyboards oder des Skripts.

Für 200€ ...
könnt ihr Teil des Spieles werden! Ihr erhaltet eine direkte Verbindung in die Entwicklerzentrale und könnt eigene Ideen und Vorschläge machen, wie das Spiel verbessert werden kann. Dazu habt ihr die Möglichkeit eigene Fragen oder Herausforderungen für das Spiel einzureichen.

Für 500€ ...
werdet ihr Ehrenproduzent. Ohja, ihr werdet nicht nur die Freuden aller vorherigen 'Dankeschöns' erfahren können, sondern auch namentlich als Ehrenproduzent im Spiel erwähnt.

Die Auswirkungen

Egal wie die Kampagne ausgeht, Braincademy wird früher (bei erfolgreichem Funding) oder später fertiggestellt und für alle Interessierten zum Download verfügbar sein. Aber um eine genauere Vorstellung zu bekommen welche Ziele bei welchem Betrag erreicht werden sollen hier eine kleine Auflistung:

Level 1: 500€
Die Anwendung wird für Mac und PC erscheinen und einen Mehrspieler-Modus über das Internet besitzen.
Das eingenommene Geld wird für die Infrastruktur des Mehrspieler-Modus sowie für die Lizenzierung von Sounds, Musik, etc. verwendet.

Level 2: 1000€
50% des Weges sind erreicht. Das bedeutet: Bessere Grafiken, bessere Sounds und einen Netzwerk-Spiel-Modus.
Dazu wird ein Portal für das Einreichen weiterer Fragen sowie eine Communityseite eingerichtet.

Level 3: 2000€ (My Funding Goal)
Wir haben es geschafft! Das Spiel wird neben einer Mac- und PC-Version auch auf Android-Geräten lauffähig sein und mit deutschen und englischen Menüs/Texten ausgestattet.
Dazu wird es mehr Mini-Spiele und Fragen geben, sowie die Möglichkeit eigene Fragen einzureichen!

Level 4: 5000€
Jetzt kommen wir so langsam in den professionellen Bereich. Mit diesem Budget wird es uns möglich sein weitere Personen zu engagieren, die helfen das Spiel auf das iPhone zu bringen... ja, ihr habt richtig gehört. Ab Level 4 wird es nicht nur für PC, Mac und Android erscheinen, sondern auch für das iPhone (und iPad).
Dazu werden die Grafiken noch mal auf Hochglanz poliert und ein besserer, schnellerer Mehrspielermodus entwickelt...

  

Du kannst auch auf andere Weisen helfen

Ihr könnt uns nicht mit Geld unterstützen? Kein Problem! Aber das heißt nicht, dass ihr nicht dennoch helfen könnt:

  • Teilt dieses Projekt über soziale Netzwerke.
  • Werdet Fan von unserer Facebook-Seite oder unserem Twitter-Account.
  • Erzählt euren Freunden und Bekannten von diesem Projekt.
  • Oder gebt uns einfach Feedback warum Braincademy für euch interessant ist.
  • Und falls du - ja genau... ich mein DICH! - ein Händchen in puncto Design und Grafiken hast... Wir suchen immer jemand der uns bei der Arbeit unterstützt! ;-)

 

Update 1:

Our campaign is live and the first update comes right away.

For our 'Stylish Gamer'-Perk we promised you Shirts and here is a small peak how they’ll look like!

They will be 100% cotton and available in Girl Fit (S-XL) and standard (S-3XL).
Available in colors: black, navy blue, indiego, royal blue, turquoise,…

Update 2:

As promised we posteda short video, taken at CeBIT 2012 of visitors playing the Braincademy Mini-Game: ‘Catch All’, in the update-section.

Note: This video does not contain any footage of the main Trivia-Part.

 

Update 3:

Uh, look whos got a new shirt! Do you want one too? – No problem… just select the corresponding perk on the right and support our project.

 

Update 4:

We put a small demo of our mini-game “Catch-All” on our webpage.

Play it online at: braincademy.de

As mentioned before: This is just one of the mini-games, not the actual Trivia-Game.
story_txt:
Zur deutschen Beschreibung 
Welcome to Braincademy 

"Braincademy" is a (edutainment-)application, which passes knowledge in a attractive way.
Many children and young people find it hard to learn for school. This can have several reasons, such as a negative reference to school and teachers or 'boring' subject matter.Many parents decide in these situations to send their children to private lessons or other, for the child, unpleasant solutions. - So the child gets forced to learn.
But most children, however, learn best while having fun or being with friends. So a hands-on approach, in which the child does not feel compelled to cram for school, might work better for most pupils.So the learners easy forget that they are learning for example for an exam and therefore learn often longer and more persistent.

Target audience:
The target audience of the application are primarily students who are looking for an attractive way to test what they've learned. But it also could be used for staff and employee taining.Moreover, even the standard gamer and everyone who loves to play appealing trivia-games, alone or with friends, is addressed. Thats becuse Braincademy is not only tool for learning, it is also a game for in between.

 Brief description of the application:
"Braincademy" is a virtual gameshow in which the candidates are asked questions from preselected areas of knowledge. Unlike other well-known game shows and their game adaptations, players will not be disqualified for an incorrect answer, but at the sum of the accumulated points at the end of each round.
Before each round the user can decide whether he wants to play alone, against a group of friends or a large group of random players.Depending on the device and the chosen game mode you play together on one device, over the local network or via Internet against each other.
Each player will be ranked based on its previous performances. So, in larger groups, only Players with a similar level of knowledge play against each other. So groups can join together based on their ranking or be assigned automatically in online games.With this classification, which is symbolized in the form of a player level, each player can also control how they have evolved during the use of the Game.

Another part of the application are the various mini-games. Due to the various kinds of tasks used in the mini-games other skills, such as hand-eye coordination, lateral thinking and the development of problem-solving strategies, are also promoted.
Suitable question catalogs for a subject or topic can be created and expanded by the community itself through the braincademy-website. So it can be ensured that for each subject or topic, a questionnaire exists or can be created in a short time by a user.Moreover, given questionnaires on general knowledge topics will be in the game by its release.

Current Development
There is currently a working prototype of the application for touch-enabled computer. It was first presented in 2012 at the CeBIT in Hanover to the public and got much attention from the visitors.

In addition to the prototype, there are already several minigames that use touchscreen inputs or motion detection (via Webcam), as well as a dozen funny animated cutscenes. Even if the current version is 'only' a prototype it already has a full voice output. In addition to an female assistant, who accompanies the player through the menu, it contains a moderator who guides the player through the game.For this project, the prototype is however completely overhauled and optimized in some places in order to increase the fun and performance.


What we need and what you get
What we need is simple. Your support spread the word or donate a small ammount!
But we do not only want you to donate and spread the word, we also want to say thank you with some perks for our contibutors.25€ (~31 US$)You have the chance to participate in the closed beta. You can create your own account and play till you drop.
42€ (~53 US$)We will tell you the answer to life the universe and everything! Really! Plus a copy of the finished game (digital copy) AND a Braincademy-Shirt!.
50€ (~63 US$)You get every perk of a lower price plus the finished game for free before the official release!
75€ (~95 US$)NOTE: THIS PERK IS ONLY FOR SUPPORTERS WITH A SHIPPING ADDRESS IN EUROPE!You get every perk of a lower price plus one of 75 limited braincademy shirts.
100€ (~126 US$)You get alongside the final version of the game and a shirt, and an original sketch from the developer documentation ... So either a page of the storyboard or script.
200€ (~250 US$)You can be part of the development team! You get a direct link to the developer center and can put own ideas and suggestions, how the game can be improved, on the table. Moreover you get the chance to put your own qutions or challanges for minigames into the game. Just tell us your idea.
500€ (~633 US$)You will become a honorary producer. Oh yes, you will be able not only to learn the joys of all previous perks, but also mentioned by name in the game.

Our development levels
Regardless of how the campaign proceeds, Braincademy will sooner or later be available for all those interested. But to get a better idea on the objectives we want to achieve here is a short list ehich feature will be released on which ammount:
Level 1: 500€The application will be released for Mac and Pc and have a multiplayer mode via the Internet.The donated money will be used for the infrastructure of the multi-player mode as well as for the licensing of sounds, music, etc..
Level 2: 1000€Half way through! This means: Better graphics, better sound and a local network game mode.There also will be a portal for submitting further questions and a community site.
Level 3: 2000€ (My Funding Goal)We made it! The game will be released not only for Mac and PC, but also for Android devices. The language of the game menues will be in German and English.There will be more mini games and questions, as well as the possibility of submitting your own questions!
Level 4: 5000€Wow. Thats a lot of money, but we still have ideas we want to fulfill. With this budget, it will be possible to hire people who help us bringing the game to the iPhone ... Yes, you heard right. We plan an iPhone app from this level on!With this ammount of money we again polish our graphics to the max and develop a better, faster multiplayer mode...

You can also help in other ways
If you can't donate it's fine. Just share this campain on Facebook and Twitter. Or just become a fan of our Facebook page or follow our Twitter account. If your mom and dad like us, ask them if they want to donate! If you're close friends with the President of the USA, let him know, too! Help us spread the word!

Share this project via your Social Networks.
Like us at Facebook or follow us on Twitter.
Tell your friends and family about this project.
Or simply give us feedback why you think Braincademy is interesting for you.
And if you have nifty hands in terms of design and graphics ... We are always looking for someone that can help us at work! ;-)

story:
Stretch Goal -- $2600! Every Workshop Available on the Internet!

Thanks to all our supporters for helping us reach our base fundraising goal! But don't stop now...

We know it’s tough to make the trip to Detroit and pay for a slot at the AMC. But we don’t want you guys to miss out on the content we’re presenting in the workshops. If we make it to $2600, we’ll be able to get a digital camera and film every single workshop, so that we can make them available on the Internet to anyone who’s interested in them. This is a really exciting possibility for us, something we hadn’t really thought about because of the cost — but if we can keep raising money, anything’s possible.

Who are you?

We’re Imagining Better Futures Through Play, part of the Allied Media Conference! We’re organizing workshops in which we’ll critique the traditional narratives of games, create new games that tell new stories, and give you the skills to make your own game and give other people a chance to experience your story. We want to showcase and encourage games that critique existing systems and present alternative futures.

What's the Allied Media Conference?

Our world today is full of stories. Stories in movies, in TV, in books, in games. But a lot of the time all these stories are really the same story over and over again. AMC is about telling new stories that include everybody, in which people do different things and have different experiences, instead of always coming out the same way. It’s for people who want to confront injustice with media making, and who want to be creators instead of consumers.

AMC is a conference for people who would rather break out of the traditional structured AAA model and build new systems and new stories using whatever means makes sense to them. With your help, we can help a whole new group of people become game designers. People like you!

What do you need money for?

Last year we had famous game designers like Paolo Pedercini, games about everything from colonization to virtual worlds to water pollution in New York, and hosted a showcase for exceptional radical games. This year we’d like to raise $2,000 to present even more games and help radical game designers to attend and mentor new designers. We’re even hoping to have a workstation for people to make games of their own right at the conference. Any money you donate will go directly to subsidizing travel and housing for our presenters and to the AMC Arcade and workstation.

A SMALL SAMPLING OF THE ASSETS IN THE DIY INDIE BUNDLE! DESIGN BY SHELLY HO.

What will I get?

If you donate $15 or more, as thanks, you’ll get our DIY Indie Bundle! Other bundles you may have seen were full of games. This one is full of content -- graphics, sounds, sprites, music, 3D art, and other stuff you can use freely while making your own games. We’ve got donations from Anna Anthropy, Jason Rohrer, RUST LTD., and other well-known designers. With our bundle you’ll have the resources you need to get started making games that tell your own stories.

At higher donation amounts, we've got more exciting rewards! We're putting together a handmade zine about radical games and game design. We've got copies of Dog Eat Dog, a tabletop roleplaying game about colonization in the Pacific Islands that first debuted at last year's Allied Media Conference. We've got custom-printed Imagining Better Futures Through Play USB drives, perfect for carrying your radical computer game around with you. We've even got professional game designers who will consult with you on design, professional musicians who you can work with to create personally written music for your game, and award-winning media collective RUST Ltd. to custom-make you a 3D computer graphic for use in a game you're making! Keep following this campaign for more details on the specific people who will be contributing.
story_txt:
Stretch Goal -- $2600! Every Workshop Available on the Internet!
Thanks to all our supporters for helping us reach our base fundraising goal! But don't stop now...
We know it’s tough to make the trip to Detroit and pay for a slot at the AMC. But we don’t want you guys to miss out on the content we’re presenting in the workshops. If we make it to $2600, we’ll be able to get a digital camera and film every single workshop, so that we can make them available on the Internet to anyone who’s interested in them. This is a really exciting possibility for us, something we hadn’t really thought about because of the cost — but if we can keep raising money, anything’s possible.

We’re organizing workshops in which we’ll critique the traditional narratives of games, create new games that tell new stories, and give you the skills to make your own game and give other people a chance to experience your story. story:
**FAQ Updated for questions concerning what happens with perks if full funding not met. Perks will be honored regardless of succeeding at goal. Flexible funding was chosen to allow contributors option of credit card.

**River Boat added as a perk, please read details.

____________________________________________________________________

yeah.. yeah.. not the snazzy kind of video you all are used to; I'm a gamer not a marketer, and would rather not raise my prices so you all can pay for one. So now that we have that out of the way.....

Whats The Story?

It's pretty simple actually. I like to game, and nothing sets off a gaming table like some themed terrain. How many of us remember the old days (yes I'm showing my age) of laying down a green cloth, tossing some books under it to make hills, cutting some blue paper for rivers, then tossing out  our minis for a good old fashion rumble. Well that was fine back in the day, but eventually that just doesn't cut it anymore.

When I wanted a table for my favorite miniature game, I started looking into the options; and there is quite a few options available. The MDF terrain business has really taken off over the last few years; and there is some impressive work out there. But as I started looking deeper a few things came to mind.

1. MDF is rather flat and I prefer more textured appearance on my western buildings

2. The cost. I started adding up the cost for pieces I wanted and quickly realized an entire board was a serious investment.

This lead to the decision to build my own personal terrain buildings out of foam core and balsa wood. One building lead to another... and before I knew it, I was hooked on the terrain side of the hobby.

It wasn't long before it hit me "hey, I can't be the only one that craves a gaming board without breaking the bank." That and my ego kicked in at the thought of thousands of gamers enjoying their evenings using my designs.

It became a personal quest for me that no gamer should have to go without terrain. This lead to three main goals for a commercial terrain product.

1. Cheap

2. Easy to store

3. Easy to transport to games


The Answer

A foam core laminated between two sides of balsa...

Cheap? check

Toss in some magnets...

Storable? check Transportable? check


Po Boys Terrain was born.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to drive prices below what you could even build the terrain for yourself; we needed a way to secure materials extremely cheap. Buying bulk, foam core and rare earth magnets (why do they call them rare? I just bought 5000 pretty easily) was not a issue. That left us with the balsa cladding. Using the majority of our start up funds, we was able to purchase the rights to five years of production from a balsa plantation. I then leverage future production with a supplier for current materials.

This left a hole in the funds to have sandwiched panels the main walls are constructed from manufactured as well as the cutting/engraving. That is where we turn to you gamers. 

Funds will be used to pay for the manufacturing of the panels, the cutting/engraving and assembly of the buildings, as well as the cost of having a proper website created.

Wait... and what do you get out of it?


Black Friday Comes Early For Gamers.


Take a look at those perks, can you beat those prices anywhere else?


(following examples is early concept art, final vector art not shown to prevent conversion to DXF files, final models will differ in scale, dimensions, and detail from concept drawing.)


-The Starter Set will include: 1x Outhouse set, 1x Standard Shop, 1x Store/Apartment,  1x Livery, 1x Triple Store Front


-The Town Set will include: 1x Outhouse set, 2x Standard Shop, 1x Livery, 1x Store/Apartment, 1x Triple Store Front, 1x Bath House, 1x Church, 1x Grand Hotel, 1x Corner Salon, 1x Hotel/Barber/Shop


-Add On:


Outhouse 2USD per 2 Frontier Singles or 1 Upscale Double   Due to size these will be solid and not magnetized


Standard Shop 3.75USD per 1 Available in pitched roof 1USD

Triple Store Front 11.50USD per 1 Available in pitched roof (if all 3 pitched 3USD)

Livery 20USD  per 1   No charge for pitched roof

Store/Apartment 15USD per 1

Bath House 2.50USD  per 1   No charge for pitched roof

Church 9.50  per 1  No charge for pitched roof

Grand Hotel 30USD per 1

Corner Salon 30USD per 1

Hotel/Barber/Shop 30USD per 1   Barber and Shop Available as pitched roof (if both pitched 2USD)

By Popular Demand--- The River Paddle Boat 60USD for US  65USD for International.  Shipping included.

Since the campaign is closing in on the last days and it appears unlikely the final bonus goal will not be met; I have included the boat as a perk as many have requested. If the Indiegogo fairy decides to show up AND the final bonus goal is met; anyone that purchased this as a perk AND contributed 50USD+ on other buildings/sets, will receive a 50USD refund.



Ghost Town-  By popular request, Sets (not individual building addons) can be pre-distressed as seen on finishes under Terrain Guide. This is only available on Frontier style sets and will be pre-stained grey. This is done by hand after machine cutting/engraving, so is labor intensive requiring a extra fee. The Starter Set will incur a 15USD fee  The Town Set will be 25USD.


Wait.. whats this Frontier and Upscale you mentioned?

The buildings are available in two different styles, at end of campaign you will be contacted by email to choose style you prefer.  Frontier has a planked side walk, is 1/2inch shorter and front facade is single layered (braced from backside)  

Left is Upscale Style    Right is Frontier Style


Wait.. whats this pitched roof thing?

Indicated buildings are available with pitched roofs at an additional cost of 1USD per building to cover additional materials. Pitched roofs can be wood plank, wood shingled, tar paper or the newly available corrugated metal.

  (flat roofs can be standard wood plank or tar paper) At end of campaign you will be contacted by email to indicate choices.

***Was asked how steep the pitched roofs are; figured if one had a question, others might too.


      ______________________________________________________________

Terrain Guide

-All contributors will receive an eBook of "Po Boys Terrain Guide to Western Terrain" Which will explain finishing techniques as well as construction techniques for sheds and extended sidewalks. Finishes discussed will include the following:

(these models was hand built by an 11y/o using the terrain guide ~ a shout out to Jason for his work)

Upscale

Frontier

Distressed

Foot print of buildings included in The Town Set (illustration of area covered, not a suggested layout.) The white shows the building foot print and the yellow shows sidewalk. The brown is 3ft x 3 ft.

Hey! Kickstarter Campaigns Get Stretch Goals!

Yes they do, but we are on Indiegogo; so we are going to call them bonus goals.

Ill throw this out there... the most expensive cost for this terrain is the cutting and etching done by a 3rd party. If we was able to do the process in-house, not only would it drastically reduce our cost but would also decrease turn around time as we would not be bound by the 3rd party manufacturer's work load with other projects.

Call me old fashion but I believe in the old saying "you scratch my back and I'll scratch yours."  Well, I'm not flying out to no contributor and scratching any backs so how about instead.. you folks help us and you get some freebies.

Yes I said freebies... Unlike a lot of stretch goals, if our bonus goals are met; instead of unlocking items for purchase, I am going to just give them to you! (Please nobody tell the accountants, I'm already in enough hot water for these crazy prices.)

20,000$ - This level will allow the purchase of an commercial grade machine to do the cutting and etching. This will mean a lot to the business. If the bonus goal is met; every person that contributed 35USD or more will receive a mining themed building measuring 18" x 12" x 10". Large enough to be the focal point of a gaming board. Art will be unlocked if initial funding goal is met. (an additional 5USD will be required for shipping)

50,000$ - yes I'm stepping it up here, and so will be the reward. This level will allow for a 2nd & 3rd cutting/engraving machine and a good quality 3D printer that will be of immense help in rapidly making molds for the upcoming Victorian City terrain. You folks go the extra mile and so will we. If the bonus goal is met; every person that contributed 50USD or more will receive a river paddle boat measuring a whopping 38" x 12" x11.5" Think about this; depending on which miniature game you prefer... that could be an entire board in itself.  (an additional 10USD  will be required for shipping)

Who am I kidding, here is a little taste... current deck test mockup. 




What you can do to help

You want those bonus goal freebies right? Then lets make this happen. We ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

I invite you to share this campaign to a maximum number of people in order to make this Indiegogo a success...


How the buildings are made

For obvious reasons I will no go into detail on the process. The basics:

Its all starts with a rough concept drawing which I use to hand build a test model using templates Ive made for standard door, window, wall sizes. I use the model to check for design issues I didn't account for during concept as well as gaming issues that could arise. This also allows my to visual finalize dimension measurements that will give a more realistic look. I then transcribe the model into a cleaned up vector image which is converted into a DXF file which can be read by cutting machinery.

A overseas 3rd party manufacture laminates balsa planks to both sides of a foam core. This provides a cheap and light  yet sturdy panel which the buildings are formed from. They then cut and edge the planks according to the DWF file I design.

With the basics of the wall now complete they are shipped to my team (also overseas) who applies the trim, glues in the window panes, cements in the magnets and pre-stains the wood.

They are then boxed and shipped to the US for us to distribute to customers.

Multistory buildings


FAQ

How does your Indiegogo process work?

Pretty simple. You start by choosing a perk that meets your need. Afterwards, if you would like a add on, pitched roofs, international shipping or the bonus goals unlock and need pay the extra shipping... you have the option to contribute gain, chose donate without perk. Calculate and add the upgrade amount; then please email us with a itemized list of what you upgraded so that we will have a redundant system to track.

At the end of the camping you will receive an email from us (at email address provided to Indiegogo when register for free account) requesting style of building and roof coverings you prefer.


Will there be differences between the sample shown and what I receive?

Actually yes there will be a couple differences, only one that you will notice. The sample sent by the 3rd party manufacturer does not have the sign included; each building will come with a sign as shown in concept art.

After receiving the sample it has been decided to change the depth of the holes made for the magnets as them being flush with the edges did not make as tight of a seal between walls as I would of liked. Also I noticed very slight damage to the sidewalk during shipping and reinforcement has been designed in to prevent.


Why do I have to pay more shipping for bonus  goals?

The price margin on the buildings is extremely small, shipping was calculated with the packages in mind. Due to size of the bonus pieces it is necessary to charge upgraded shipping to prevent us going into the hole.

Will the buildings be the same price after the Indiegogo campaign?

Short answer.. no. Long answer.. noooooooooo. While the prices will always be extremely competitive compared to whats on the market; the margin being offered for this event can not be maintained if I ever want to eat more then top ramen for dinner.

Why is there a minimum purchase required to get bonus goals?

The is significant material cost to the bonus goal rewards. We just can not go into the hole by allowing someone to buy a 2$ outhouse and receive an item worth way more in materials.

Can I buy a perk as a gift?

YES!  What a champ..  If you would like to donate campaign but give the perk to someone as a gift, go through the normal process of making a donation in your name.  For billing purposes, this action must be in your name.  After the campaign end we will send a message to you through  to the email address you provided.  We will request your address from you at that time.  Please reply with the information of the person who should receive the perk, and we will make sure it gets to them.

How do I get my loot the fastest?

You'll notice that perks are listed by waves. The first wave is estimated to be shipped between mid and end of January. Each consecutive wave will follow at one month intervals. To get your perks faster... contribute faster then the next guy ;)

How is shipping cost handled?

Shipping to US addresses is included in perk prices. International customers will need to add an additional 5USD to cover the extra cost.

*remember if bonus goals are met the rewards are free but shipping is increased.

What is the future business plans?

Original plan was to add latex playing mats and molded accessories (wagon wheels, barrels, and such) to the product line right after perks was completed. Due to insistence of some fan I'm afraid I'll be tarred and feathered if I keep to original plan. So those items will have to wait a bit.

After the compensation to contributors has been fulfilled; work on the next terrain package will begin. By popular demand... a Victorian City set that is unrivaled by any current product.


Why did you alter the the scale and dimensions on the concept art?

For any person familiar with the process, a accurate vector image can be converted into a file that modern cutters can read. Bluntly, these files are money for us. While I'm sure the majority of you would never dream of doing such a thing; you always have to keep a eye out for low down varmints.


How can I pay?

Payment is made thru PayPal. Those without a PayPal account can use the service to make a credit card purchase. That being said... PayPal accounts are free and we strongly urge contributors to make use of an actual PayPal account as makes transfer of money and accounting much easier for us, as well saves us on fees.

Do I get anything else for tossing my money at you?

Every contributor will receive a 10% off coupon to be used on a future order (no limitation on size of order)

What happens if initial funding goal is not met?

Materials for Wave 1 perks has already been secured. The contributors price will cover manufacturing and shipping of the perks nearly exact; I will not see a profit till full funding has been reached (when quantity discount for manufacturing kicks in.)

In the worse case scenario, and funding goal not reach, perks can still be prepared and monetarily I will break even. Contributors receive perks, I earn reputation and my product gets exposure. As an old school Marine; word means more than money, so I still call this a win/win scenario. That being said... join in people!! I can not wait to see screen shots of the paddle boat being used in games to start appearing across the web! That can only happen with your support.

How do we contact you?

While the official website is being created you can contact us thru the current facebook page https://www.facebook.com/PB.Terrain. Or at pb_terrain@live.com


*****miniatures displayed in video are for scale purposes only and not intended as an endorsement by Wyrd Miniatures, Reaper Miniatures, or Privateer Press*****

Long answer.. noooooooooo. While the prices will always be extremely competitive compared to whats on the market; the margin being offered for this event can not be maintained if I ever want to eat more then top ramen for dinner.Why is there a minimum purchase required to get bonus goals?The is significant material cost to the bonus goal rewards. We just can not go into the hole by allowing someone to buy a 2$ outhouse and receive an item worth way more in materials.Can I buy a perk as a gift?YES!  What a champ..  If you would like to donate campaign but give the perk to someone as a gift, go through the normal 
process of making a donation in your name.  For billing purposes, this 
action must be in your name.  After the campaign end we will send a message
 to you through  to the email address you provided.  We will 
request your address from you at that time.  Please reply with the 
information of the person who should receive the perk, and we will make 
sure it gets to them.How do I get my loot the fastest?You'll notice that perks are listed by waves. The first wave is estimated to be shipped between mid and end of January. Each consecutive wave will follow at one month intervals. To get your perks faster... contribute faster then the next guy ;)How is shipping cost handled?Shipping to US addresses is included in perk prices. International customers will need to add an additional 5USD to cover the extra cost.*remember if bonus goals are met the rewards are free but shipping is increased.What is the future business plans?Original plan was to add latex playing mats and molded accessories (wagon wheels, barrels, and such) to the product line right after perks was completed. Due to insistence of some fan I'm afraid I'll be tarred and feathered if I keep to original plan. So those items will have to wait a bit.After the compensation to contributors has been fulfilled; work on the next terrain package will begin. By popular demand... a Victorian City set that is unrivaled by any current product.Why did you alter the the scale and dimensions on the concept art?For any person familiar with the process, a accurate vector image can be converted into a file that modern cutters can read. Bluntly, these files are money for us. While I'm sure the majority of you would never dream of doing such a thing; you always have to keep a eye out for low down varmints.How can I pay?Payment is made thru PayPal. Those without a PayPal account can use the service to make a credit card purchase. That being said... PayPal accounts are free and we strongly urge contributors to make use of an actual PayPal account as makes transfer of money and accounting much easier for us, as well saves us on fees.Do I get anything else for tossing my money at you?Every contributor will receive a 10% off coupon to be used on a future order (no limitation on size of order)What happens if initial funding goal is not met?Materials for Wave 1 perks has already been secured. The contributors price will cover manufacturing and shipping of the perks nearly exact; I will not see a profit till full funding has been reached (when quantity discount for manufacturing kicks in.)In the worse case scenario, and funding goal not reach, perks can still be prepared and monetarily I will break even. Contributors receive perks, I earn reputation and my product gets exposure. As an old school Marine; word means more than money, so I still call this a win/win scenario. That being said... join in people!! I can not wait to see screen shots of the paddle boat being used in games to start appearing across the web! That can only happen with your support.How do we contact you?While the official website is being created you can contact us thru the current facebook page https://www.facebook.com/PB.Terrain. Or at pb_terrain@live.com*****miniatures displayed in video are for scale purposes only and not intended as an endorsement by Wyrd Miniatures, Reaper Miniatures, or Privateer Press*****

story:
GOOD NEWS! The early top 50 perk backers will receive GameSir's super gift for free!
Every lucky backer will receive only one gift. GameSir reserves the right of final explanation.

About GameSir
Founded in 2010, GameSir is one of the world’s leading providers of high-performance gaming peripherals, providing high-tech gaming hardware and excellent gaming experience for every gamer. In the name of "Gaming is Winning", we know exactly what each gamer really crave - the accurate control and enhanced gaming experience. Therefore, we tested every potential solution to meet the needs of gamers, which is our mission.

How was GameSir G6s born?
Inspired by the hypercars, our engineers put forward a revolutionary design concept that combines the flexible analogue of gamepad and the accurate control of touchscreen, subverting the design of traditional mobile game controller. Thus, the GameSir G6s mobile gaming touchroller was born.

What is touchroller?
Touchroller is a brand new hybrid game controller defined by GameSir that combines the advantages of gamepad and touchscreen controls for perfect in-game control and gaming experience! GameSir G6s will be your most loyal ally to win FPS and MOBA games.

 

 

 

 

 

Innovation - Gamepad Control with Left Hand, Touchscreen Control with Right Hand
GameSir G6s is a hybrid game controller developed specifically for mobile games that combines the advantages of actual analogue controller and touchscreen control. You can use the left controller to move or jump while focusing on the precise aiming on the right touchscreen. Four-finger control, one step ahead. Dominate the battle with absolutely accurate control.

Absolute Control - Suitable for FPS & MOBA Games
The professional layout of 10 configurable buttons and an ultra-thin 3D joystick enables optimal combination control of moving, aiming, jumping and shooting in FPS games, or tactical positioning and combo attacks in MOBA games. GameSir G6s has the most buttons in its class and you are armed to the teeth. The configurable buttons can be used to deliver a range of combo attacks, including auto-fire, drop shot, and one-click switching equipment.

Stability - Bluetooth 5.0 Connection
Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connection which features high sensitivity and low latency. Indulge in exceptional gaming experience without the hassle of cables.

Exclusivity - Exclusive GameSir G-Touch Technology
GameSir G6s features G-Touch technology that supports iOS native games. You can safely play FPS or MOBA games downloaded from the App Store without worrying about being banned, such as PUBG Mobile, Fortnite, Rules of Survival, Mobile Legends, Identity V, Brawl Stars, Minecraft, Extraordinary Ones, LifeAfter, Honkai Impact 3rd, Arena of Valor, Zombs Royale, Hole.io.

Reality - Equipped with Micro Switches
The L1, L2 and R1 trigger buttons are micro switches that enable up to 3 million keystroke lifespan, small contact gap, snap action, high sensitivity and short action travel for a realistic shooting experience.

Immersion - Dual Motor Vibration
Dual motor vibration enhances game immersion, allowing you to enjoy interactive in-game effects, delivering a real-time and realistic gaming experience. You can customize the intensity and duration of the vibration with the GameSir G-Crux app.

Ultra-Endurance - Long Battery Life
Featuring Nordic 52832 chip with 3mAh ultra-low power consumption and up to 40 hours of running time. You can fight to the end!

Pro-Mechanism - Stable Structural Design
With a two-stage retractable structural design, the mobile phone can be stuck more stably without shaking. Let you focus on the core battle.

Convenience - Able to charge or use earphone while playing. No matter how long the battle lasts, you won't worry that it will bother your family.

Software Support - GameSir G-Crux APP
Download the GameSir G-Crux app to your iPhone, and you can choose the official configuration or customize keys to your own preference to maximize in-game control. The whole setup takes just 30 seconds and you never miss any battle. Instead, you have more fun.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here are the details of the perks you can choose when supporting this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page).

 

 

 

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will witness the birth of GameSir G6s. We have a fully functional physical model of the device now and all funds raised will go directly to funding the final mass production. We would like you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

As early backers, we are keen on rewarding you with some unique perks. All GameSir G6s claimed as perks will have at least 25% off the planned retail price. The first deliveries will begin in October 2019 - only for crowdfunding backers.

 

 

 

 

 

Q：What mobile phone is GameSir G6s compatible with?
A：GameSir G6s is only compatible with iPhone. Please note, it is not compatible with Android mobile phone.


Q：What is the difference between GameSir G6s and GameSir G6?
A：GameSir G6s and G6 are slightly different in appearance. In addition, the GameSir G6s features dual motor vibration.


Q：How to use GameSir G6s?
A：GameSir G6s User Manual
https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2241/8433/files/G6_G6s_User_Manual.pdf?8714​

Download the GameSir G-Crux APP
https://gamesir.hk/pages/g-crux

GameSir G6s Tutorial
https://gamesir.hk/pages/gamesir-g6-tutorial-en

チュートリアル：GameSir G6sの使い方
https://gamesir.hk/pages/gamesir-g6s-tutorial-jp


Q：When is expected to deliver the items?
A：We plan to ship items from Hong Kong in October 2019. The estimated delivery time is approximately 20-25 business days.

 
Q：How can I track my package?
A：If the item has been shipped, we will upload or email you the tracking number and tracking link. You can track your package anytime, anywhere.


Q：Can I change my shipping address?
A：You can email us at cs@gamesir.hk to check the status of your order. If the item has not been shipped, we can change the shipping address for you.


Q：Can I cancel my order?
A：You can email us at cs@gamesir.hk to check the status of your order. If the item has not been shipped, we can cancel the order for you.


Q：Which countries can you ship to?
A：We can ship to most countries, but we are unable to ship to PO boxes or APO/FPO addresses. If it turns out that it cannot be shipped to your country, we will cancel your order and fully refund you.

 
Q：Who pays duties & import taxes?
A：Your order may be subject to additional taxes, duties and/or fees (including customs clearance) charged by the destination country. Please contact the destination country’s customs office for more information. You will be responsible for any customs duties or taxes required in destination country. During shipment, USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL or your local customs may contact you to collect duties or taxes. Once you pay the customs broker, your order will be processed for final delivery. Unfortunately, we are unable to mark items as gifts or to change commercial invoices.


Q：What is your warranty policy?
A：* 12-month replacement of the same model from the date you received it.
* Contact us for free online technical support.
Website: https://gamesir.hk
E-mail: cs@gamesir.hk
Hotline: +1-888-937-1733 (USA & Canada)
Service Hours: Sat.-Sun. 9:00 AM-6:00 PM PST
                              Mon.-Wed. 6:00 AM-6:00 PM PST
                              Thur.-Fri. 6:00 AM-3:00 PM PST


Q：What is your return policy?
A：We want you to be thrilled with your new purchase. However, if you need to return an item, we're here to help. You have 30 calendar days to return the item from the date you received it. Please ensure that the item you're returning is in original package with all the items, accessories, giveaways and documentation that were included when you received it. And you need to pay the return shipping cost. If you want to start the return process, please send an email to cs@gamesir.hk to tell us the reason for the return and check the return address.


Q：Who can I reach out to if I still need help?
A：You can contact us at cs@gamesir.hk.

story:
About us

MK1881 Miniatures is the new miniature line from Maki Games, featuring high quality miniatures mainly suitable for fantasy football games and more. We offer innovative design and very high quality casts. MK1881 team is composed of many experienced artists all with several years of experience in their fields that range from design, to classic and 3D sculpting and painting.  We work only with high quality casting facilities and use only top quality materials for our creations. All miniatures are made with lead free metal.

MK1881 temporary page can be found here:
http://www.mk1881.com
MK1881 work progress can be followed on our FB page:
https://www.facebook.com/mk1881


Why crowd funding?

At MK1881 we have done extensive research and tests to deliver only very high quality miniatures. Designing, sculpting and printing these miniatures is quite expensive. We are looking for your contribution to speed up the printing and casting process and cover some of the costs for the design and production of special characters for this fantasy football team.

Want even more MK1881 miniatures.. look at our Honos campaign:

Our models:

After several collaborations and tests we selected a selected group of professional 3D sculpting artists and 3D printing companies. Merging the experience in traditional sculpting techniques of our team with the new technologies of 3D sculpting and rapid prototyping we are able to produce top quality miniatures. Some examples can be seen in the video below.


We already have all the 3D models necessary to print and put in production the team.

A lot of time was spent to make sure models had less separated parts as possible, and where this was not possible we are making sure that the junctions are done at art to ease assembly and increase the strength of them. As a player I hate when my nicely painted models looses his arm during a game, and as a modeler I hate to spend hours trying to figure out where a specific piece goes or attaches.


The basic perks:

Dice perk added: 6.00€ for 3 dice (for supporters) and 9.00€ for 3 dice (for non supporters) 



Special Character Perk, special character to empower and differentiate your existing team.
This perk will give you access to one each of the special that will be unlocked in the campaign. At the end you will choose the ones you want.
9€ perk is for the model only including shipping worldwide, if you have bought any perk before this it will be 6€.

12 model team, enough to play the majority of Fantasy Football games on the market. Bloodbo

16 model team, for the enthusiast gamer and collector who wants them all.

Stretch goals:

The dice are unlocked. These will be available to current pledgers (not for Support Us level) also valid if you pledge on our other camapign.
with a 6.00€ add-on option. Or 9.00€ for non backers including shipping.

The free thematic limited edition ball has been unlocked. Free with every team of 11 or more players. King level gets x5 balls.

The field will be available in hard foam or soft version and will be 38€ each.

Special Character 1 will be a female character. We are running a contest to give her a name on our FB page.

Special character 2 - Hubris 

Special character 3 - Eldrid

Special character 4 - Horken (WIP)

Special character 5 - Irtacka (WIP)

Also you get a special coin. See updates for an example of a real coin.

NEW GOALS. The 3D fields are not tested yet, so will be released later with the Cabiri, so Stretch goals have been updated.
 


Coach unlocked at 11000

Cheerleaders at 12000

Doctor at 13000



We are working to get more intermediate stretch goals to add to the campaign. Some will be FREE rewards other Add-Ons


The models in detail:

Assassin 1

 

Assassin 2

Blitzer 1

Blitzer 2

Blitzer 3

Blitzer 4

Line 1

Line 2

Line 3

Line 4

Line 5

Line 6

Runner 1

Runner 2

Witch 1


Witch 2

Size Comparison:

During the creation of the Tanatos team, and W.I.P pics several have questioned the size of the models. Below courtesy by RN estudio there is a picture of the actual models next to some existing well known models for comparison purposes. It was an overall opinion that the selected size is the best to match any current range.

Risk and Challenges:

Not many, all the 3D models are done and visible, the printing facility was chosen and selected for his highest printing standard, test models where done to make sure the materials and size are adequate to obtain the highest standard product. We have already ordered and paid for the metal for this production. Many can testify that any models we have worked in the past have always been top quality casts, and we have produced hundreds of models for other companies in the past. At this stage the only challenge is to ship all the items according to the planned schedule and to unlock enough stretch goals to create the special characters for this team.

Box Art Team:

 RN Estudio will be painting the box art of this team and the painted team will be for sale. If interested please contact me or Rafa at RN for more details. During the campaign we will show more painted models.

Here you can see the first 3 painted models of the box art. If interested this team will be for sale by RN Estudio.

 

Special Limited Field:

FF Fields will be making a special field for the Tanatos only available during the Indiegogo. After the campaign these fields will not be available anymore. This Indiegogo is your chance to get something unique for your team.


And here it is: When we  reach the stretch goal this field will be available for 38€

A few examples of the two available versions: Hard and Rollable

Price:

The prices set in the campaign have a significant discount and shipping included. These prices will be no longer available from us in the future. Our policy is to keep prices stable and avoid crazy holidays or event discount in order to protect our present and future distributors / store sales. So this is your chance to save some cash on our products: don't miss it. 


 Additional notes:

- All the models will be made using very high quality lead free metal that matches or exceeds the standards required by law in all the states that these miniatures will be sent. 
- Models will be provided un-assembled and unpainted.
- Models are not intended for kids 14yrs old or younger due to small parts, 
- Each model will come with a matching 25mm round plastic base.

Our policy is to keep prices stable and avoid crazy holidays or event discount in order to protect our present and future distributors / store sales. So this is your chance to save some cash on our products: don't miss it. 

Additional notes:
- All the models will be made using very high quality lead free metal that matches or exceeds the standards required by law in all the states that these miniatures will be sent. - Models will be provided un-assembled and unpainted.- Models are not intended for kids 14yrs old or younger due to small parts, - Each model will come with a matching 25mm round plastic base.

story:
Bonjour à tous,

Je m'appelle Alain Truffier (Alias Angelstar) et je suis le créateur de plusieurs jeux en ligne dont 650km.com et Druidik.com.

J'ai fondé mon entreprise "Les mots dits Français" pour permettre aux milliers de joueurs en ligne de profiter de nouveaux concepts, add-on et animations au sein de mes jeux.


Ce projet de financement INDIEGOGO permet d'améliorer 650km.com en créant de nouveaux pack d'objets et scénarios pour les ruines.

Cette page INDIEGOGO vous permet de faire vos contributions en toute sécurité et de recevoir vos KM-POINTS sous 24 heures après le crédit des achats sur le compte de 650KM

Je vous invite à mettre à jour vos informations personnelles dans 650km.Com afin que je puisse faire la liaison entre le contributeur INDIEGOGO et le joueur de 650km!

Grâce à ces fonds il me sera possible de maintenir le jeu en état et également de pouvoir créer de nouveaux scénarios et objets pour les prochaines ruines.

Il est donc désormais possible d'utiliser vos cartes de crédits ainsi que vos comptes Paypal pour obtenir des KM-POINTS!

Comme ce projet et vos paiements sont liés à mon activités dans le jeu j'ai décidé de présenter une échelle de travaux qui sera fait en fonction de vos contributions totales :


PALIER DE CONTRIBUTION

TRAVAUX QUI SERONT EFFECTUES

300 $

Mise en ligne de nouveaux objets en boutique (Pack outils, Pack pièges)

600 $

Création d'une nouvelle salle des ruines + 1 nouvel objet surprise collector!

900 $

Mise en ligne de nouveaux objets  basés sur les suggestions des joueurs (forum).

1200 $

Création d'une nouvelle salle des ruines + 1 nouvel objet surprise collector!

1500 $

Mise en ligne de nouveaux objets  basés sur les suggestions des joueurs (forum).

1800 $

Création d'une nouvelle salle des ruines + 1 nouvel objet surprise collector!

2500 $

Nouveau livre et pleins de nouveaux objets à fabriquer!

Alain Truffier / Angelstar
