story:
Short Summary

We always wanted to create a funny little jump´n´run for mobile platforms.This was in our minds for a quite long time now. About a half year ago, we finally had a good and simple idea for a small project.

After some refining of all our thoughts, we finally began to start a concept for Tower Tapper. We are currently developing on it about some months ago.

In the development process we became more and more fond of the game. We want to develop Tower Tapper with the best possible quality but for that we need more funding.

 

  

 

What is Tower Tapper?

Description

Our hero in Tower Tapper is a little snail called snailie. Snailie has a big dream: He wants to get away fromthe smoky townground and climb the highest tower to watch the clear and beautiful skyline at sunset.

Snailie is determined of his dream and wants it to become reality. The big problem is, there will be a looooooong distance to conquer. On top of that, there are plenty of enemies and obstacles who will get in his way.

Can you help snailie to reach the top of the tower and fullfill his dream?

 

 Tower Tapper Prototype Gameplay

 

Genre / Category

Tower Tapper is a variation of jump´n´run / Platformer mix. Instead of jump and run you gonna crawl and hop.

Snailie is constantly crawling upwards the tower, by tapping on the screen he will hop from one tower side to the other(Picture below).

 

 

This will help him to reach the tower roof faster.

Hop to avoid obstacles and enemies. If the enemies annoy you, just flat them!

 

Short Feature List:

- Random generated Levels(each time you play, the level is different from before)

- Innovative and easy gameplay

- Many possibilities to upgrade Snailie in the integrated store

- Unique Style

- Game Center integration(Achievements / Leaderboard)

- Experience System

 

Why we Need Your Help

We want to create Tower Tapper with the best quality and make our players happy.

For that we need also a lot of content, like a big arsenal of features you can unlock and enjoy.

To assure a funny game that makes you smile, we need more ressources to get everything implemented, that we have in mind. We need you to support us in funding to get everything done well!

As a little thanks, we got some perks that you hopefully like.

We will list the perks at the bottom of the page with some visual feedback.

 

Other Ways You Can Help us

If you cant contribute, but still like our campaign, you could still be a great help to us with the following actions :

- You could tell your friends about us and our campaign

- You could spread our campaign over facebook, twitter and google+

- You could shout it all over the world about our campaign! :)



Developer Blog Link (for additional informations about the development process)



Perk List

-Shopper($10)

 

-Watcher($20)

 

-Collector($50)

 

-Snailie´s Helper($75)

 

-Advertiser($100)

-Librarian($250)

 

-Designator($500)

 

-Crafter($750)

 

-Coating Specialist($1000)

 

-Engineer($2000)

story:
CubeGun had been Greenlit 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=251925916


Hi,everyone!

We're two indie game developers who come from ShangHai,China. YouHang Huang and Hao chen. CubeGun is our first game,We had worked on this game for 6 months,Most of the work had completed,but we still need more funds to make the game better! 

Extend Goal: $ 15000

1.Add more weapons and maps type.

2.Add fast and stable multi-player game server.(we want to add more servers in different area. such as USA,Europe,Asia)

3.Multi-language:The game will be available in as many languages as we can.


About CUBEGUN:

CubeGun is a sandbox game,You can design your battleship and fight with other players all over the world.We designed weapons with a "rock-paper-scissor"  strategy. Every weapon has its pros and cons.Players have to use weapons wisely to win a match!


Feature 

  1. Design your own Battle Ship and Island 
    Design your own battle ship with weapons,armors,functional devices In a cube based editor. 
  2. Weapon Balance 
    Every weapon has pros and cons,Every weapon is useful in the right position. 
  3. Multiple Battle Strategy 
    To fight with different types of enemy ships,use different battle strategy. Use Energy Shield to block bullets, Use Mortar or Torpedo to break shield,AA-Gun to shoot torpedo,or use armor to protect your deck and charge enemy ship directly.Use thrust to rush to the weak side of enemy ship.Use cannon to push enemy back when they charge toward you. 
  4. No Role Level 
    Players are equal in online battle.There is no such thing as a level 99 player kills a level 1 player with a single bullet.It's all about your control of movement and right combination of weapons. 
  5. Design your own Profession 
    Although there is no built-in profession as warrior or archer,With different combination of weapons and devices,you can customize the profession of your ship such as:Long range attack/Charge/Tank/Cure/Weapon obstruct. 
  6. Simple combat control 
    Movement,Rotation and Critical Skill cast. 
  7. Weapon Merge & Weapon Height 
    Put multiple weapons of the same kind in square pattern to merge them into a bigger one,make it more powerful.Raise the deck under a weapon to increase the shooting range. 
  8. Everything is physical and breakable 
    Every part of ship can be destroyed.When you drive your ship to collide the other ship,Decks will be broken and ship will be push back and rotate.Terrain can be destroyed with weapons too. 
  9. Support Multi-player battle up to 3V3 
    Cooperate with your teammates in online battle,Cure your teammate's ship with huge combined Repair Station,Arm with plenty of armors to be the Tank of team and cover your long range attacker teammate,Collide enemy with your ship to stop them from escaping when your teammate is using super skill.

Weapons&Devices

 

  • Minigun:

    High fire rate,high bullet speed,need turn your ship to aim.

  • Energy Shield:Blocks high speed bullets,width 5,length 1,will turn red and lose function temporarily when get overtaken damage. 
  • Torpedo:Fly pass through Energy shield,only weapon to destroy deck under device.  
  • AA-Gun:Shoot down all slow bullets as torpedo and mortar ammo,high fire rate,low range,low damage. 

  • Armor:Protect the deck under it,can take several torpedo attacks,or use to collide with enemy's ship.Armor on a multiple level deck is very hard to destroy. 


  • Mortar:Low fire rate,low bullet speed,long range.Fly pass through Energy shield and armor,destroy target directly,destroy multiple targets nearby with high damage,suitable to attack heavy armor enemy,not suitable to flexible ships. 


  • Thrust:The bigger your ship is,the slower it will be,both in movement and steer,thrust increase ship's move and steer speed. 


  • Cannon:Low fire rate,high bullet speed,push enemy ships back when hit,use it to push enemy back or push them to hill and crash into pieces. 


  • Interference Robot:Hit target to make them lose function temporarily,can be used to interference weapons/energy shield/repair station/thrust etc. 


  • Repair Station:Repair device nearby automatically,not include itself. 


  • Deck Cube:All devices must be on a deck cube,A deck can have several levels,Higher deck gives the weapon on it longer attack range.If all levels of deck are destroyed,the device on it will be destroyed too,So use torpedo to attack the deck or collide it with your ship will destroy enemy's weapons and other devices indirectly. 


  • Engine:Heart of the ship,more health point than other device,so is the deck under it.If it is destroyed,the ship will crash.

Gameplay

  • Single Game 

  • We made a serial of tutorial levels to teach players the pros and cons of every weapon,let you practice designing different kinds of ships to fight against enemies.Challenge epic Boss when you are ready.Some player may like to build their own levels with the built-in level and enemy editor.We plan to publish the whole editor to public in near future then you can upload your home made single play level to our game server and share with others. 

  • Loot Base 

  • Build your military island and loot random player's island with your battle ship.If you defeat them,loot their gold,or leave yours if you die.This game mode need a network to download random island data,but don't need continuous connection as PVP mode,so if you are playing this game mode with your mobile device outside your house where is no WIFI connection,mobile network will be enough. 

  • Online Battle 

  • This is the best part of the game,Fight other players with your teammate in real time,test your skills you practice in single game,and cooperate with your teammate.You can choose a buit-in map or a player made map. 
    We plan to publish several game mode of online game map 
    • Battle Map:players vs players death match. 
    • Cooperation Island Map: players vs computer controlled evil island 
    • Cooperation Ship Map: players vs computer controlled evil ships

F&Q

Which platforms will be CubeGun released for?

CubeGun will be released for Steam(Windows/Mac/Linux),iOS,Android.

How will the funding be spent?

Once the campaign gets funded,the rest will be used to pay rent game server, buy software and hardware for the development of the game.

How and when do I get my perks?

Usually,depending on the type of perk ,we'll be delivered in the first and second month when we gets successfully funded. 

About us

We are CandyRocket  studio,though we are small,we want to creat fun,cool,and creative games. 

Members: 2

YouHang Huang: he works on this game as a programmer and a game designer.

Hao Chen:he works on this game as a artist, include 3D,2D and UI work.

Multiple Battle Strategy To fight with different types of enemy ships,use different battle strategy. Use Energy Shield to block bullets, Use Mortar or Torpedo to break shield,AA-Gun to shoot torpedo,or use armor to protect your deck and charge enemy ship directly.Use thrust to rush to the weak side of enemy ship.Use cannon to push enemy back when they charge toward you. 

No Role Level Players are equal in online battle.There is no such thing as a level 99 player kills a level 1 player with a single bullet.It's all about your control of movement and right combination of weapons. 

Design your own Profession Although there is no built-in profession as warrior or archer,With different combination of weapons and devices,you can customize the profession of your ship such as:Long range attack/Charge/Tank/Cure/Weapon obstruct. 

Simple combat control Movement,Rotation and Critical Skill cast. 

Weapon Merge & Weapon Height Put multiple weapons of the same kind in square pattern to merge them into a bigger one,make it more powerful.Raise the deck under a weapon to increase the shooting range. 

Everything is physical and breakable Every part of ship can be destroyed.When you drive your ship to collide the other ship,Decks will be broken and ship will be push back and rotate.Terrain can be destroyed with weapons too. 

Support Multi-player battle up to 3V3 Cooperate with your teammates in online battle,Cure your teammate's ship with huge combined Repair Station,Arm with plenty of armors to be the Tank of team and cover your long range attacker teammate,Collide enemy with your ship to stop them from escaping when your teammate is using super skill.
Weapons&Devices 

Minigun:High fire rate,high bullet speed,need turn your ship to aim.





Energy Shield:Blocks high speed bullets,width 5,length 1,will turn red and lose function temporarily when get overtaken damage. 


Torpedo:Fly pass through Energy shield,only weapon to destroy deck under device.  


AA-Gun:Shoot down all slow bullets as torpedo and mortar ammo,high fire rate,low range,low damage. 




Armor:Protect the deck under it,can take several torpedo attacks,or use to collide with enemy's ship.Armor on a multiple level deck is very hard to destroy. 





Mortar:Low fire rate,low bullet speed,long range.Fly pass through Energy shield and armor,destroy target directly,destroy multiple targets nearby with high damage,suitable to attack heavy armor enemy,not suitable to flexible ships. 





Thrust:The bigger your ship is,the slower it will be,both in movement and steer,thrust increase ship's move and steer speed. 





Cannon:Low fire rate,high bullet speed,push enemy ships back when hit,use it to push enemy back or push them to hill and crash into pieces. 





Interference Robot:Hit target to make them lose function temporarily,can be used to interference weapons/energy shield/repair station/thrust etc. 





Repair Station:Repair device nearby automatically,not include itself. 





Deck Cube:All devices must be on a deck cube,A deck can have several levels,Higher deck gives the weapon on it longer attack range.If all levels of deck are destroyed,the device on it will be destroyed too,So use torpedo to attack the deck or collide it with your ship will destroy enemy's weapons and other devices indirectly. 





Engine:Heart of the ship,more health point than other device,so is the deck under it.If it is destroyed,the ship will crash.

GameplaySingle Game We made a serial of tutorial levels to teach players the pros and cons of every weapon,let you practice designing different kinds of ships to fight against enemies.Challenge epic Boss when you are ready.Some player may like to build their own levels with the built-in level and enemy editor.We plan to publish the whole editor to public in near future then you can upload your home made single play level to our game server and share with others. Loot Base Build your military island and loot random player's island with your battle ship.If you defeat them,loot their gold,or leave yours if you die.This game mode need a network to download random island data,but don't need continuous connection as PVP mode,so if you are playing this game mode with your mobile device outside your house where is no WIFI connection,mobile network will be enough. Online Battle This is the best part of the game,Fight other players with your teammate in real time,test your skills you practice in single game,and cooperate with your teammate.You can choose a buit-in map or a player made map. We plan to publish several game mode of online game map 
Battle Map:players vs players death match. 
Cooperation Island Map: players vs computer controlled evil island 
Cooperation Ship Map: players vs computer controlled evil ships

F&QWhich platforms will be CubeGun released for?CubeGun will be released for Steam(Windows/Mac/Linux),iOS,Android.How will the funding be spent?Once the campaign gets funded,the rest will be used to pay rent game server, buy software and hardware for the development of the game.How and when do I get my perks?Usually,depending on the type of perk ,we'll be delivered in the first and second month when we gets successfully funded. About usWe are CandyRocket  studio,though we are small,we want to creat fun,cool,and creative games. Members: 2YouHang Huang: he works on this game as a programmer and a game designer.Hao Chen:he works on this game as a artist, include 3D,2D and UI work.

story:
Update: We have an additional $500 from an offline donor!!


Our Story

We're tournament organizers who have been attaching ourselves to other tournaments to get our games into major gaming tournaments. We have been trying to get the community together to have one massive tournament, but with that not looking very likely, we've decided to just try to hold the biggest tournament we can by piggybacking on the biggest fighting game tournament in the world, Evolution!


The Impact

The good: If we reach our goal, the players who have been playing for years will finally get a nice payday and more than just the top 3 or 4 players will get paid. 

The bad: The same old same old, we will only have money from the entry fee to distribute between the winners. 


What We Need & What You Get

Every penny we earn will be given to the winners of the tournament. We (the organizers) will not get a single penny of it. The only other source of funding we have is the registration fee for each player. At the moment, all we can give people is thanks for donating, names will be featured on 2 or 3 gaming websites, and I will personally send a thank you email to everyone who helps out. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word, let people know of the tournament going on July 29-31 in Las Vegas, NV

story:
TopServer is Live!

Be among the first to play the recently released beta version of this fun new game where you get to play your way to a fine dining living wage restaurant job! And read on to learn the story behind it and to be part of the team that takes it to the next level.

The Game Olive Garden Doesn't Want You to Play

Did you know the federal minimum wage for tipped workers is only $2.13 per hour? Servers at restaurants like Olive Garden, Longhorn Steakhouse, and Capitol Grill often work without paid sick leave or any opportunities for advancement. The restaurant industry is the fastest-growing segment of US economy, with almost 11 million workers; yet it's also the absolute lowest paying employer — the minimum wage for tipped workers has been stuck at $2.13 for the last 23 years.

Where Does TopServer Come In?

Millions of people in the restaurant industry deserve better; to move up to a fine dining job that pays a living wage. That's why we’ve created a fun, mobile app game-based training program called TopServer, designed to bring our renowned restaurant training programs to mobile phones nationwide. We've worked with top developers and restaurants to develop our beta version and we're ready to go live!

Game Play Highlights

  • Work in four flashy, detailed restaurant interiors, based on real-life establishments
  • Brush up on industry terms in wine, food, and service
  • Master the nine principles of hospitality
  • Advance through five challenging levels of service toward a fair-wage, fine dining job.

Where You Come In

We have gotten incredible start-up support from The Workers Lab, worked with an award-winning team on game development and design, and have built a beta version of TopServer ready for you to try out! Be part of our team as we move from beta to a full release by helping us to raise the $20,000 we need for this next phase.

This first version of the game is complete, and we want to invite you to get in on the ground floor and tell us what you think. What should we keep in mind as we make improvements and get it ready to reach millions of restaurant workers?

What the Money Will Support

We've put our hearts and souls into this early version of Top Server, but it is still a Beta version. That's where you can help! We want to go full 1.0, so we're counting on your backing to allow us to include possible features such as:

  • Procedurally generated gameplay for more variety
  • Mixology minigame for the aspiring bartender
  • New restaurants to bring more workers and owners into the movement
  • More cocktails from Blue Dolphins to Pink Squirrels
  • More menu items to broaden your horizons
  • Greater service detail for even more server skills

Donate Today!

Whether it's $5 or $5,000, any amount you give contributes not only to getting TopServer into the world; it will support ongoing efforts to win fair wages and working conditions for the nation's 11 million restaurant workers.

And we just found out that we have a 2:1 matching grant from The Workers Lab! That means every dollar you give will be doubled - if you give $25 we get $50 towards our goal. Be part of the community that kicks in the $20,000 that will ensure that TopServer is the effective (and fun!) tool for change that we know it can be.

Other Ways You Can Get Involved

  1. Share this page with everyone in your circle and help take TopServer to the next level!
  2. Play TopServer! and let us know what you think.
  3. Join ROC and be part of the fight for justice for all restaurant workers.

About Us

TopSever was created by a collaborative team composed of staff from national restaurant worker's rights nonprofit ROC United, professors and staff from The Everett Program at UC Santa Cruz, world class game developers DigiPalms, and The Workers Lab, an accelerator focused on transforming the lives of US workers.

We also had the pleasure of featuring four incredible restaurant partners: Amali - NY, NY, COLORS NY - NY, NY, COLORS Detroit - Detroit, MI, Girard - Philadelphia, PA. The environments where all the game action happens are based on these 'High Road' restaurants. Check them out online and stop by for a bite to eat next time you’re in their city!

Thank You!

Thank you so very much! We appreciate your support in getting this project off the ground and are so glad to have you join us on the ground floor. Together we can make this happen.

story:
Build Prosperity with New Cities

—A fresh take on take on the classic game.

 

GAME IS CURRENTLY AVAILABLE FOR: Windows 7+ (64-bit required), Certain Linux Distros (Ubuntu 18.04+ confirmed)

 

https://newcities.io
@lone_pine_games

 

Build your city - From a small farm town to a thriving metropolis.

You’re the Mayor, and you lead your city with impunity. There are no councilmembers here—every decision, every victory and setback… it all comes down to you. Build your city from the ground up, rural town to metropolitan jewel, calling all the shots along the way.

Learn their names - Track individual people and businesses.

Peek into the lives of your citizens and follow them through their daily routines. See where they work, play, and sleep. Big Brother Mayor is watching. And hopefully, you’re benevolent.

Plan for traffic - Upgrade roads and plan highway networks.

Carefully place your city’s roads to create the circulatory system that keeps it humming. Make sure to leave room for upgrades once your citizens outgrow the humble two-lane road…

Parks and schools - Create a livable city -- to collect more taxes.

Add all the amenities to keep your citizens happy. Word of mouth gets around, and you’ll find your population booming in short order. More citizens mean more money, and often more problems in turn.

Balance the budget - From careful planning to emergency fixes.

There’s no Finance Director to delegate your budget to. Manage your finances well to keep your city in the black. Sustainable growth is the key, don’t overextend yourself. The economy can be a fickle beast.

Get the skyscraper - Cultivate a towering city center and win world renown.

The badge of honor for cities across the globe are towers of steel and glass that reach forth to touch the sky itself. Do your job right, and the skyscraper is yours—along with the renown and prestige it brings.

Design a unique city - The building designer allows for endless creativity.

Set your creativity loose. Build the city of your dreams, or recreate the city you live in. The choice is yours. You have every tool at your disposal, mayor. The only limit is your imagination.

Perils straight from the headlines – The only disasters are the ones we make

Tired of UFOs attacking your city? So are we. This isn’t that kind of city builder. Here, the disasters are of our own design. Do you have what it takes to keep your city thriving through an economic recession? Take a Line of Credit from the bank and get to work, but remember—you’ll have to pay it back eventually…

 

A word from Lone Pine:

I have developed and played games since childhood. I think that the time is right for a game that focuses on creative approaches to city living. Players can design residential areas with parks, museums, schools and retail centers. They can build industrial centers,  office complexes and farms. All of this is connected by roads, and highways.

Over the past year, I’ve developed a city builder with a traffic simulation and customizable 3D rendered buildings. In the past few months I’ve fully implemented “The Prosperity System” which will define the game: it’s a dynamic economic model where neighborhoods thrive or fail based on access to work, shopping, parks, and schools.

The game is based around six “heatmaps.” The heatmaps are Pollution, Crime, Education, Prosperity, Value, and Density. Essentially, Education (plus a good road system) creates Prosperity, Prosperity (among other things) creates Value, and Value (plus Prosperity) creates Density. However, Density creates Crime and Pollution, which have a negative impact on Prosperity and Value, creating a negative feedback loop. Negative feedback loops are important to me, since they counteract the explosive nature of positive feedback loops which turn many simulation games into sandboxes.

As a player, you have two options. You can buy very expensive city services (schools, parks, police stations, etc) to cut through the negative feedback loop. Alternately, you can build a broad, flat, suburban city, with the intention to grow a dense city center later in the game. I call these two approaches “San Francisco vs Los Angeles.” I consider this to be a kind of morality system, creating the opportunity for different play-styles and different cities.

In this game, a city doesn’t grow linearly. Instead, the community behaves like a living organism, emerging out of chaos and always at risk of dying. You’ll have to shepherd your city through randomized recessions in the national economy as well as the consequences of any blunders you make. It will be a unique game compared with other city builders, with a more vulnerable budget maintaining a fundamentally unstable economic system.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I need you to join our campaign with a donation that supports a closed alpha test for a few months prior to the launch of Early Access on Steam.

You get a set of rewards based on your contribution. This includes logo T-Shirts, votes in the developer poll, participation in the closed alpha, building naming and more. See the Perks section to see all the details and select the support tier that’s right for you!

 

Your Support will Bring New Cities to Life

The game is fully developed and almost ready for players to enjoy. We need to perform a live test with a select group of campaign supporters in a closed alpha release. We intend to conduct Feature Polls soon, in which we will determine the next set of features to be included in New Cities.

We are active on social media and across the web promoting New Cities to the gaming community. Your contribution will help expand our presence and get the word out.

Thank you for your support, and we look forward to hearing of your experiences with New Cities soon.

 

The Perks

You’re probably as eager to play New Cities as we are to have you play it, so the first 1000 contributors (Apartment Complex tier and up) will receive access to the Closed Alpha. It begins in January and runs right up to the Early Access release. Put down some roads, build up a few cities, and you’ll have our undivided attention for feedback as we tune and polish. 

(Of course, any tier with perks related to your name are completely optional. You can choose to claim the rest of the perks in the tier anonymously. You are also welcome to suggest alternate names or pseudonyms, pending approval.)

The House tier comes with the opportunity to put your name in the credits right beside the developers, as a special thanks for your support, along with access to an exclusive channel and role on our Discord. You’ll have the ear of the development team; use this newfound power wisely. And, random citizens of cities will be named after you, with your permission of course! 

The next tier, Apartment Complex, nets you access to the Closed Alpha (Limited quantity of Close Alpha slots available) and a New Cities Game Key on final release. You'll also have the opportunity to vote in a New Feature poll to shape the next leg of our journey. But like any good mayor, perhaps you want to keep building onward and upward from there. 

With the Factory tier, you become the proud owner of a New Cities T-Shirt, along with additional votes in New Feature polls to ensure your voice is heard. You’ll get a chance to shape the future of the game—we need your feedback to make it the best it can be! As a special thanks, schools, parks and roads will be named in your honor.

The Office Complex tier is more of a good thing, Your voting power is upped to ten votes in the New Feature polls, so you can rest comfortably in the knowledge that the future of New Cities is being shaped by dapper and wise patrons such as yourself. You’ll also be immortalized in-game with a statue, handcrafted by the developers with your input.

The final tier, Skyscraper, is for the true city builder fanatic. You’ll get an opportunity to have a 30 minute conversation with the developer to discuss features and gameplay and to suggest new content. In addition to all of the above, you get a massive one hundred votes in the New Feature polls, and top-tier naming in the credits. Oh, and you’ll get your very own 3D printed skyscraper.

-----------------------------------------------------

story:
CLUNKY HERO is a story-driven, platformer metroidvania game, with a touch of RPG and tons of humor. If you’d love a platformer game where you have a strong storyline, can talk with characters, solve side quests, find and buy items, change weapons and wearables, with great hand-drawn-looking backgrounds,  presented in a very comical way, then CLUNKY HERO might be the game of your dreams!


We like to think of it as a blend between the gameplay of Hollow Knight, with the humor and parodist elements of a card game like Munchkin.

 

CLUNKY HERO will be 100% DRM-Free. You’ll receive a key to download it on your favorite platform (Steam, GoG, etc.). We’ll release it for Windows, MacOs and Linux with an expected release date for Spring 2021. However, we have set our first goal to port Clunky Hero for Nintendo Switch and, if we manage to collect more funds, we'd love to port it also for PS, Xbox and other consoles!

 

In a village far, far away, a dull peasant named Rufus was living an ordinary life. The boss of the house was his wife, Brunilde, a boisterously smart and funny woman that you wouldn’t exactly call “pretty”. Life was nice and happy in the village, until one day, awakened by some magical mistake, the Evil One started to spread his minions around town, performing hideous acts against the people. The worst of which was the kidnapping of Brunilde. She was torn from Rufus’ hands and put in a prison at the Evil One’s castle. Transformed into a blondie duck-faced doll girl, she now spends all her time staring at herself in a small handheld mirror.

 

Determined to win her back, Rufus made a helmet out of a bucket and picked a broom as a weapon. Everybody now calls him the CLUNKY HERO, but he might be the only hope to defeat the evil one that no one wants to call by name. Rufus is now on his journey to save his wife and the whole village!

 

 

Besides the initial broom, there are a minimum of 6 different weapons that Rufus can use during his journey. Some are secret loot to be found in the remote corners of the many levels that he must explore during the adventure, some others are sold at high prices in various shops throughout the land and some he must win by defeating a boss. We don’t want to spoil all of the surprises, but here’s a few to check out…

 

The Evil One’s minions cover a wide range of clumsy foes. From the Vegan Zombie and the Monthly Ghost, to the One-Legged Frog and the Sober Man, they provide a great challenge to Rufus despite their clumsiness. To save his beloved Brunilde, the CLUNKY HERO must defeat over 30 different kinds of them.

Here some that you can find at the beginning of the adventure…

 

Besides the game itself and tons of bonus digital features like wallpapers, concept art, and the soundtrack, there are lots of other cool physical perks available, including an awesome poster, a CLUNKY HERO t-shirt and even a retro style physical copy of CLUNKY HERO in a big box!

These are all great, but the most attractive rewards are the ones that will place the backers into the game itself! By helping us to fund the game, we’re offering you a chance at naming an item or a character, or having a portrait on a painting hung on a wall in one of the levels! Not to mention the possibility to Become a Character! There’s also the many combos and packs that allow you to collect various rewards at a fair price.

 

The game is being developed by Nicola Piovesan and Chaosmonger Studio. After ENCODYA, it’s the second big game project for our award-winning film production company. As veterans of cinema and animation, we are committed to high quality standards and pledge to apply these standards to all elements of our game, including storyline, visual aesthetic, acting, music and sound.
story_txt: CLUNKY HERO is a story-driven, platformer metroidvania game, with a touch of RPG and tons of humor. If you’d love a platformer game where you have a strong storyline, can talk with characters, solve side quests, find and buy items, change weapons and wearables, with great hand-drawn-looking backgrounds,  presented in a very comical way, then CLUNKY HERO might be the game of your dreams!We like to think of it as a blend between the gameplay of Hollow Knight, with the humor and parodist elements of a card game like Munchkin. CLUNKY HERO will be 100% DRM-Free. You’ll receive a key to download it on your favorite platform (Steam, GoG, etc.). We’ll release it for Windows, MacOs and Linux with an expected release date for Spring 2021. However, we have set our first goal to port Clunky Hero for Nintendo Switch and, if we manage to collect more funds, we'd love to port it also for PS, Xbox and other consoles! In a village far, far away, a dull peasant named Rufus was living an ordinary life. The boss of the house was his wife, Brunilde, a boisterously smart and funny woman that you wouldn’t exactly call “pretty”. story:
PROJECT UPDATE:  Thanks to the individual and collective support of generous contributors we attained the stretch goal of $15,000 that could pay for 10 fishing boats and send 10 kids to school! Members of the campaign team donated additional money to pay for all the fundraising costs including the perks and Indiegogo + FirstGiving fees, so 100% of the contributions went to the Boats For Busuanga project ($11,500) and the Tapulanga Foundation ($3,500).

In 2012, the creators of Cards Against Humanity raised money that they generously donated to a cause.  In this Cards for Charity Campaign all of the contributions will be donated to projects that will give Typhoon Haiyan victims a chance to earn a living and give children a chance to go to school.





More than 6,000 people died when the Philippines was hit by the strongest storm in recorded history a few months ago.  At that time, emergency food supplies thankfully provided immediate albeit transient relief.  At this stage, affected families need help to regain their lost livelihood and restore their self-sufficiency.





Your contribution will support the Boats For Busuanga project, an undertaking by doctors from the University of the Philippines College of Medicine and a local non-governmental organization. The goal is to replace 100 boats destroyed by the storm. The new boats are made of fiberglass instead of wood to save trees.




As of early March, the first 9 boats have been built so there are 91 more to go!  The "BANTAY DUGONG" sign on the boats means guardian of dugong, an endangered species related to manatees.  Boat recipients sign an agreement with the C3 international conservation group to help protect the environment.




Your contribution will also help provide scholarships and books for children in need.  Since 2001, the Tapulanga Foundation has been assisting students at St. Francis of Assisi School with tuition and supplies.  Benefactors of the non-profit organization are located worldwide from Maryland, USA to Oslo, Norway. 




You may get game/post/note cards as a token of gratitude for your contribution.  The post cards and note cards feature the artwork of Michael Graham, whose paintings have been on exhibit at the Katzen Art Center and The Daystar Gallery in Washington DC.  His original pieces, which are inspired by his uplifting experiences in the Philippines, are available at the contribution level of $500.




Thank you for helping us help others through the Cards for Charity Campaign.
Let us give folks a chance to earn and give kids a chance to learn.










________________________________________________________________
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
What is Indiegogo?
Indiegogo is an international crowdfunding platform that empowers ideas and enables people to donate funds easily.
Is this site safe and secure?
Statement from Indiegogo: "Indiegogo is firmly committed to the safety and security of your online transactions. We work with our payment processors to make every effort to ensure the security of transactions. Safeguards are in place to secure the information we collect online, prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, maintain data accuracy and ensure the appropriate use of information. Our powerful Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption technology protects sensitive information from unauthorized parties. SSL encrypts sensitive information before it travels over the internet. In addition, credit card numbers are never stored on our servers."
Can my contribution be tax-deductible?
Your contribution will be received and disbursed by Friends of Tapulanga Inc., which is a verified nonprofit organization.  When you contribute, you will receive an email from FirstGiving, the nonprofit payments processor of Indiegogo, confirming the tax-deductible status of your contribution. Please note that 501(c)(3) tax exemptions and deductions are only available in the United States.
What percent of my contribution will go to charity?
Members of the campaign team will pay for all the costs of this fundraising project including Indiegogo fees, so 100% of your contribution will go to the charitable projects.

_____________________________________________________________
CREDITS
Boats For Busuanga Photography: Dr. Tony Dans; Tapulanga Foundation Videography: Jay Abello

CARDS FOR CHARITY CAMPAIGN TEAM
Robin Abello is the Executive Director of Friends of Tapulanga Inc., a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization based in Maryland that supports the Tapulanga Foundation's projects in the Philippines.  He is an Information Technology specialist who trained at University of Maryland and Carnegie Mellon University.  Alvin Sanico is an Assistant Professor of Medicine at Johns Hopkins in Maryland.  He graduated from the University of the Philippines College of Arts & Letters and the University of the Philippines College of Medicine.  He and his wife serve as sponsors for students in need by providing scholarships. Michael Graham is an Associate Professor Emeritus at American University, where he taught graphic design for more than 30 years.  His artwork has been featured at the Katzen Art Center and The Daystar Gallery in Washington DC.  Proceeds from those exhibits support charity projects in the Philippines.

story:
The Technoid International company is currently preparing a world match system. The company is composed mostly of gamers and IT engineers. We have met and successfully created this web application in 2012.

More information regarding to the gaming application can be found at
 
Final test: http://battlesearch.com
Try it
Login: test
Password: test123
 
 
 
 
 


The Technoid International company is already contracted with Umww company about the advertisement for this application. The funds raised from this campaign will go to the advertisement. The incoming finances from this campaign will not cover the advertising costs.
 
 
 
 


Playing PC games serves the purpose of relax and fun. There are also players who take playing games serious and they are trying to make money this way. The Application is based on a match system where players can search opponents from all around the world, create teams and play favorite pc games (Dota2, LoL, Counter-strike, Skype games etc.) for real money or fight for skill points. The whole website is secured and trusted via EV SLL certificate.
 
Thank you very much!
 
 
Andrej Vandak & Technoid International team
